DealChicken invites you to be part of our Mother's Day gift guide. From brunch to jewelry, DealChicken's Mother's Day promotion makes it easy for online shoppers to discover and connect with neighborhood merchants. A new merchant will be featured daily May 1-12 during our exclusive promotion. For more information, download our Mother's Day information sheet.
To reserve one of 12 featured Mother's Day positions, contact {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.OwnerLastName} by April 17th at {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
DealChicken alerts consumers to great deals. Consumers purchase the deal on DealChicken.com and redeem at your location or website. Merchants receive a revenue split less a 2.5% credit card processing fee.
